ygData.subject: Re: Rerunning HTML form login

St. Ack,

I am also trying to use HTML form credentials in Heretrix (1.8.0)=
.  I
read the section that you provided a link for, but I seem to be
missin=
g some fields.  From the manual: "In this section you can add
login credent=
ials that will allow Heritrix to gain access to areas of
websites requiring=
 authentication. As with all modules they are only
added here (supplying a =
unique name for each credential) and then
configured on the settings page (=
Section 6.3, "Settings")."

I added a credential of type
org.archive.crawle=
r.datamodel.credential.HtmlFormCredential to
SubModules and then went to th=
e Settings page.  Under
credential-store, all that I see is the name of my =
credential and "?
Credential that has all necessary for running a POST/GET =
to an HTML
login form."  How do I actually set the value of the credential?=
  I
apologize if I am missing something obvious.

Thanks for the assistance=
,
-Ryan
